transcript:
Customer: Haan ji sir bataye.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan ji sir bataye.
Customer: Haan main diamond se sales se baat kar raha hun mujhe apni service band karwani hai.
Executive: Kya karna hai?
Customer: Haan mujhe mam apni service band karni hai service apni band karni hai jo bhi service please apna refund chahiye.
Customer: Haan main batata hun na aap meri profile usko khole usko check kijiye aap khud dekh lo kar raha hun main kyun nahi kar raha hun mam.
Executive: Wait karo bataiye aap mujhe bataiye to sahi khud se bhi to bataiye.
Customer: Mam kis kisko bataun aap batao chalo jo mera account dekha usko bata diya maine sab kuch main itna pareshan hun mam jo bhi main batata hun aap meri baat suno itni mere paas leads aa rahi hai mam sabse pehle ye baat to inquiries wali hai theek hai.
Customer: Aur dusri baat ye mere paas leads aati hai to teen teen char char ghante ki waiting mein.
Customer: To pehle bhi contact ho chuka hota hai kisi aur se theek hai na.
Customer: Aur jitni bhi maine abhi tak leads uthai hai is month mein ek bhi lead aisi nahi hai ki jisne ye bola hai ki haan mujhe service chahiye koi bolta batayenge koi bol kisi ka number off aata hai koi apne ghar ke number se call kar leta hai koi unke ghar ke ladies se uthati nahi to har bhaiya bahar pe gaye hain bahar gaye hain ye lo.
Executive: Hmm theek hai.
Customer: Aur baat kitni aap meri show kar rahe honge aap jo bhi meri leads maine uthai hai abhi tak aap unko ek ek karke call kijiye aur unse ye puchna ki diamond vishwas ke sath ki baat ki thi ki aap unse loan kar liya ya nahi liya agar main jhoot bol raha hun aap se.
Executive: Nahi sir aap jhoot kyun bolenge jisko business aata hai wo kyun jhoot bolega definitely main wo to trust kar rahi hun main aapko.
Customer: Aur sabse pehli baat mam ye ab bola ja raha hai mujhse ki aapko plan lena chahiye tha 55000 wala theek hai agar mujhe ye plan chahiye hota to mujhe uske bare mein pehle batate.
Executive: Hmm hmm hmm.
Customer: Mujhe sahi baat hai plan ke bare mein kuch nahi bataya kuch nahi bataya gaya mujhe ye plan bataya gaya to maine ye kar liya.
Customer: Ab meri profile check kijiye.
Executive: Chalo theek hai sir maine aapki baat mam aap aap bol doge theek hai main profile aapki theek karati hun wo baat aapki theek hai aap profile meri kab tak theek karaoge.
Executive: Sir profile to bilkul theek hi hai ab leads thodi si mam theek hi hai to aap meri mam ek kam kijiye aap meri profile kholiye aur usme dekhiye leads 151 se lekar two ya dhai fit tak ek ya do fit ki hoti hai.
Customer: Aur wo bhi koi NP ki koi waha ki isme to sir ek bhi lead se abhi tak char fit ya panch fit che fit wali aayi hi nahi aur chaliye mam maan bhi leta hun main ek ya do fit ki hi hoti hai kam se kam wo inquiries wale to na ho lene wale to ho.
Executive: Haan sahi baat hai sir.
Customer: Meri tabhi to mam aisa hota hai har hafte mein aap yakin karna har hafte mein puri leads nahi utha pa raha hun main gusse mein kyunki main leads ek uthata hun call karta hun ya to number off aata hai ya bol dete bhai batayenge.
Customer: Isse acha mam mera direct share wo badhiya hai facebook is jo hai ads chal rahe hain wo badhiya hai mam isse to.
Executive: Hmm.
Executive: Theek hai sir main ek bar dekhti hun aapko bhi call back karti hun.
Customer: Aap dekh lijiye na agar aapko lag raha hai ki leads sahi hai ya dogi to mam mujhe koi shok nahi hai refund karane ka agar nahi hai to mera to bilkul main bilkul apni services band karwana chahta hun aur mera refund chahiye.
Executive: Theek hai sir aapke aapki baat sun li abhi main call back karti hun main call back karti hun.
Customer: Theek hai theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to close service and get refund.

- Leads are mostly inquiries, not potential buyers.

- Leads have long waiting times.

- Leads are of low quality and incorrect numbers.

- Was not informed about the 55000 plan.



Resolution:

- Executive assured to check the profile.

- Executive assured to call back.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back the customer.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, buyleads, subscription, service closure
